long_description: The Backcountry Access Aluminum Crystal card helps you identify snow grain types while also providing additional information to help you travel safely in the backcountry. Card includes snow grain classification symbols and 1mm and 3mm magnifying grids. Flip the card over to use the multiple slope indexes to calculate the slope steepness on a topographic map; also includes a 10cm ruler. Durable aluminum card is sized to easily fit in a pant pocket or backpack.
short_description: The Backcountry Access Aluminum Crystal card helps you identify snow grain types while also providing additional information to help you travel safely in the backcountry.
